abstract: Ken Belson On Pro Football column contends that NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell faces an increasingly messy job in 2015 as it becomes more about managing public and politically charged matters involving player misconduct and less about the business operations of the league.
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell has tried to turn the page on 2014, but the problems he faces — from off-field violence to team malfeasance — are stubborn and complicated.

headline.main: Roger Goodell Looks to the Future, but Troubles Cloud the View
headline.print_headline: Goodell Looks to the Future, but Troubles Cloud the View

snippet: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell has tried to turn the page on 2014, but the problems he faces — from off-field violence to team malfeasance — are stubborn and complicated.
